price: 56. Ma waantoobayaanse in Alle doono maahee; waa Isaga Rabbiga mudan inay aadmigu ka cabsadaan, oo mudan inuu Denbi Dhaafo.
arabic: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā yadhkurūna illā an yashāa al-lahu huwa ahlu al-taqwā wa-ahlu al-maghfirati
